exec go test -exec vimto -run Success -vm.image=ghcr.io/cilium/ci-kernels:6.6 -v .
stdout TestSuccess

! exec go test -exec vimto -run Failure -vm.image=ghcr.io/cilium/ci-kernels:6.6 .
stdout TestFailure

-- go.mod --

module test

go 1.21

-- main_test.go --

package main

import "testing"

func TestSuccess(t *testing.T) {
	t.Log("Zaphod Beeblebrox is a hoopy frood")
}

func TestFailure(t *testing.T) {
	t.Error("Groop, I implore thee, my foonting turlingdromes")
}
